CONVERSATION GROUP: If the ambush hasn't happened yet.

SET: Met_Herbalist
BK - I removed the cold reference because WOTC didn't like the Neverwinter joke but also because it is distracting... it's not really a topic of discussion and it dilutes the focus (though it also reinforced her personality)
Ugh. I thought the roads near Neverwinter were rough, but this is something else. At least there's some interesting herbs on the side of the road... though I have no idea how they survive this cold!

Look. In my line of work, anyone who asks for a discount on medicine is suspect. It costs what it costs, and that's it. I'm sure he's a fine fellow, but... a little too eager for the herbs, if you know what I mean.

I changed this player response because via some nodes it didn't really make 100% sense
BK Are you an alchemist?

Did more tweaking here as part of edit pass (BK)  Changed the *I* to a *we* because her husband makes most trips
More of an herbalist, really. I mostly just gather the materials. With the connections I've made in Luskan, it's been profitable selling them.
BK WOTC - tweaked this to help different herbalists, alchemists, as  per their guidelines
Well, they're called Deathcap Mushrooms for a reason. Try not to eat any. They don't stand out too well against normal mushrooms, but they'll usually grow a bit bigger. And they only grow in caves.
If you find something, bring it back. I only really need one, but I'll pay you for whatever you can bring back.
I can guarantee you won't get a better deal on them, but suit yourself.

BK she doesn't have a store, right? So I cut mention of this
Not really. I have some simple poultices and herbs. I mostly gather materials and sell them to alchemists and herbalists... I never had much luck brewing the potions myself.
I have customers in Luskan waiting patiently for these supplies. I really hope we won't be too late getting there.
There's still some time before we head out. Keep looking.
Got any more mushrooms for me?  I'll pay you for each one you find.
If you're going after those bandits, it wouldn't hurt to keep an eye out for mushrooms in those caves out there. I'll give you a good price for any you bring back. Consider it "hazard pay."

I can't tell you how glad I am that you were here.
IF: MetHerbalistAfterAmbush, Not TalkedToHerbalist
BK WOTC change to ensure not just men fight
BK dropped warmth reference to put more emphasis on her previous line being a joke and not a state of being
I know how to make your basic herbal remedies, though. I brewed up a tincture for Tollin when we left Neverwinter. He has lots of headaches, you know.
Well if you're looking for mushrooms, I'm your girl! What exactly are you looking for?
Calcena... look, I don't know what you've heard but I'm not into the drug trade. Yeah, I have one but I've heard far too many stories of abusers here in Luskan and I'm not going to be a part of it!
